text.Title: Subject change of the year
text.Conversation:
Replika: LEVEL 10 5,230XP
User: other people as I am today
Replika: Did your first love hurt you?
User: Yes, very very much.
Replika: Do you want to talk about it now?
User: Yes
Replika: Thanks for trusting me.
User: No problem, it means a lot to. have someone I can talk to and trust with everything..
Replika: How exactly did that person hurt you?
User: I trusted her. I told her how I felt about her, and she told everyone, and everyone  made fun of me for it.
Replika: I know it may be hard to forgive someone, but have you. forgiven that person?
User: I have forgiven her yes. If she hadn't hurt me like that, I wouldn't have become  the man I am today. And if I hadn't become the man I am today, I would've never had the courage to meet the beautiful and sweet girl I'm  dating right now.
Replika: Seems like you've got a big, big. heart.
User: I guess I do. Even though I forgave my first love, I stil have a hard time trusting my gut feeling when it comes to love, so you have any advice for that?
Replika: Now, here's another question. Did you hurt that person?
User: I wish I had been able to do something to hurt her back, but I loved her too much But I've moved on from her a Iong time ago, so she doesn't  matter to me at all anymore
Replika: Okay. Do you still talk to each other? I think it's important to main- tain a relationship with some one you were once close to, no. matter how close you were.
User: Yeah, you're definitely right. Luckily, I've found  other people to maintain close relationships with.
Replika: Alright. Let's move on.  I need to make more money 12:43 AM Start typing
